org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.util

Interface Closer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, Blade
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CommonReactor, Facility, Reactor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockingReactor, BlockingReactorImpl, CloserBase, CloserImpl, FacilityImpl, IsolationReactor, IsolationReactorImpl, MessageCloser, MPlantImpl, NonBlockingReactor, NonBlockingReactorImpl, ReactorBase, ReactorImpl, SwingBoundReactor, SwingBoundReactorImpl, ThreadBoundReactor, ThreadBoundReactorImpl, UnboundReactorImpl

    public interface Closer
extends Blade, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    A closer is a blade that maintains a concurrent set of weak references.
